001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.canvas;
002
003import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Assignment;
004import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.GradeBook;
005import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Student;
006import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.*;
007import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.canvas.GradesFromCanvas.CanvasAssignment;
008import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.canvas.GradesFromCanvas.CanvasStudent;
009import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
010
011import static org.hamcrest.CoreMatchers.equalTo;
012import static org.hamcrest.CoreMatchers.hasItem;
013import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
014import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertThrows;
015
016public class GradesFromCanvasImporterTest extends CanvasTestCase {
017
018  @Test
019  public void errorWhenCanvasQuizDoesNotExistInGradebook() {
020    String studentId = "studentId";
021
022    GradeBook gradebook = new GradeBook("test");
023    Student student = new Student(studentId);
024    gradebook.addStudent(student);
025
026    GradesFromCanvas canvas = new GradesFromCanvas();
027    CanvasAssignment assignment = new CanvasAssignment("quiz", 1234);
028    CanvasStudent canvasStudent = createCanvasStudentWithId(studentId);
029    canvasStudent.setScore(assignment, 3.4);
030    canvas.addStudent(canvasStudent);
031
032    assertThrows(IllegalStateException.class, () ->
033      GradesFromCanvasImporter.importGradesFromCanvas(canvas, gradebook)
034    );
035  }
036
037  private CanvasStudent createCanvasStudentWithId(String studentId) {
038    return createCanvasStudent("First", "Last", studentId);
039  }
040
041  @Test
042  public void importScoreFromCanvasWhenStudentIdMatchesCanvasId() {
043    String studentId = "studentId";
044    String quizName = "quiz";
045    double score = 3.4;
046
047    GradeBook gradebook = new GradeBook("test");
048    gradebook.addAssignment(new Assignment(quizName, 4.0));
049    Student student = new Student(studentId);
050    gradebook.addStudent(student);
051
052    GradesFromCanvas canvas = new GradesFromCanvas();
053    CanvasAssignment assignment = new CanvasAssignment(quizName, 1234);
054    CanvasStudent canvasStudent = createCanvasStudentWithId(studentId);
055    canvasStudent.setScore(assignment, score);
056    canvas.addStudent(canvasStudent);
057
058    GradesFromCanvasImporter.importGradesFromCanvas(canvas, gradebook);
059
060    assertThat(student.getGradeNames(), hasItem(quizName));
061    assertThat(student.getGrade(quizName).getScore(), equalTo(score));
062  }
063
064  @Test
065  public void importScoreFromCanvasWhenStudentNameMatchesCanvasName() {
066    String firstName = "first";
067    String lastName = "last";
068
069    String quizName = "quiz";
070    double score = 3.4;
071
072    GradeBook gradebook = new GradeBook("test");
073    gradebook.addAssignment(new Assignment(quizName, 4.0));
074    Student student = new Student("studentId");
075    student.setFirstName(firstName);
076    student.setLastName(lastName);
077    gradebook.addStudent(student);
078
079    GradesFromCanvas canvas = new GradesFromCanvas();
080    CanvasStudent canvasStudent = createCanvasStudent(firstName, lastName);
081    CanvasAssignment quiz = new CanvasAssignment(quizName, 1234);
082    canvasStudent.setScore(quiz, score);
083    canvas.addStudent(canvasStudent);
084
085    GradesFromCanvasImporter.importGradesFromCanvas(canvas, gradebook);
086
087    assertThat(student.getGradeNames(), hasItem(quizName));
088    assertThat(student.getGrade(quizName).getScore(), equalTo(score));
089  }
090
091
092
093}
